SELECT orderNo, orderPrname, orderCount, orderPrice, orderStatus, orderDate FROM (select list.*, rownum as rnum from(SELECT orderNo, orderPrname, orderCount, orderPrice, orderStatus, orderDate FROM order_tb where (orderStatus = '배송완료' or orderStatus = '주문취소' or orderStatus = '주문반품')
orderPrname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and orderDate between to_date(#{s_startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{s_endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
order by orderNo desc)list )
rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}

select to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as chartDate, sum(case when orderStatus ='배송완료' THEN orderprice else '0' end) as chartSales, sum(case when orderStatus in ('주문취소','주문반품') THEN orderprice else '0' end) as chartRefund from order_tb where to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_char((sysdate -3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by chartdate

select to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM') as chartDate, sum(case when orderStatus ='배송완료' THEN orderprice else '0' end) as chartSales, sum(case when orderStatus in ('주문취소','주문반품') THEN orderprice else '0' end) as chartRefund from order_tb where to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -3), 'YYYY-MM') || '-01' and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY-MM') order by chartdate
